description: Patrick and I had fun making this amateur sci-fi scene, as we were provoking the Eye, watching it watch us, while I was worshiping every muscle of the young bodybuilder's body. Fantasy scenario aside, Patrick was truly hot and into it. Can't wait for our next scene together! Patrick is a very promising straight boy. I'm sure I'll make him cross over to the dark side! ;)
title: The Eye, Scene #01
